item.title: Cortex M4
item.description:
![Pasted image 20250604230344.png](/images/Pasted image 20250604230344.png) ![Pasted image 20250604230353.png](/images/Pasted image 20250604230353.png)

![Pasted image 20250604221847.png](/images/Pasted image 20250604221847.png)

包含 Processor Core + FPU | NVIC | MPU | Bus Martrix | Flash Patch & DWT | Debug Access Port | ETM + SWV 这几个逻辑结构，用寄存器操控

1. Processor Core + FPU

![Pasted image 20250604230023.png](/images/Pasted image 20250604230023.png) 摘自《ARM Cortex-M3 与 Cortex-M4 权威指南第三版》

STMG4 -> Cortex-M4 处理器 -> Cortex-M4 内核+核心外设 -> Cortex-M4 内核 -> Cortex-M4 三级流水线 -> armv7-m 架构
